titles.title: A resolution commending Blue Star Families for supporting military families and increasing awareness of the unique challenges of military life.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 8/4/2009--Introduced. Recognizes the sacrifices made by Blue Star Families as members of military families and as an organization dedicated to all military families and improving the welfare of the United States. Commends the patriotic efforts of Blue Star Families. Commends and offers sincere thanks to all service members and military families. Urges the people of the United States to acknowledge the inspirational sacrifices of military families.
